p: The L. perfoliatum seed mucilage (LPSM) was extracted according to the method of Koocheki et al. ( 2013). The seeds were dispersed in deionized water (1:30 ratio), and the extraction process was performed for 90 min at pH 8 and 48°C. The slurry was oven‐dried (45°C), milled, sieved, and stored at 4°C.
